metadata.title: CVE-2023-37204 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A website could have obscured the fullscreen notification by using an option element by introducing lag via an expensive computational function. This could have led to user confusion and possible spoofing attacks. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 115.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 22.04, the firefox package is just a script that installs the Firefox snap

criterions.comment: firefox package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in kinetic is affected and needs fixing.
